item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} DNS Query
item_prototype.description: A string which specifies the record being queried.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} DNS Server IP address
item_prototype.description: A string which specifies the DNS Server IP address.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} DNS VRF
item_prototype.description: This field is used to specify the VPN name in which the RTT operation will be used. For regular RTT operation this field should not be configured. The agent will use this field to identify the VPN routing Table for this operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest RTT Operation Completed Time
item_prototype.description: The completion time of the latest RTT operation successfully completed.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest RTT Operation Sense Status
item_prototype.description: A sense code for the completion status of the latest RTT operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest RTT Operation Timestamp
item_prototype.description: The value of the agent system time at the time of the latest RTT operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Count
item_prototype.description: This is the total number of probe operations that have been attempted. This value is incremented for each start of an RTT operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Frequency
item_prototype.description: Specifies the duration between initiating each RTT operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Operation State
item_prototype.description:
The RttMonOperStatus object is used to manage the 'state' of the probe that is implementing conceptual RTT control row.
1 = Reset 2 = Orderly Stop 3 = Immediate Stop 4 = Pending 5 = Inactive 6 = Active 7 = Restart

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Threshold
item_prototype.description: This object defines an administrative threshold limit. If the RTT operation time exceeds this limit and if the conditions specified in rttMonReactAdminThresholdType or rttMonHistoryAdminFilter are satisfied, a threshold is generated.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Timeout
item_prototype.description: Specifies the duration to wait for a RTT operation completion.

trigger_prototype.name: DNS SLA check for {ITEM.VALUE3} hasn't run for 10 polls
Last DNS SLA check for {ITEM.VALUE3} failed

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP Method
item_prototype.description:
A code that represents the specific type of RTT operation.
0 = N/A 1 = HTTP GET

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP Proxy
item_prototype.description: This string represents the proxy server information.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP String 1
item_prototype.description: This string stores the content of HTTP raw request. If the request cannot fit into String1 then it should be split and put in Strings 1 through 5.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP String 2
item_prototype.description: This string stores the content of HTTP raw request. If the request cannot fit into String1 then it should be split and put in Strings 1 through 5.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP String 3
item_prototype.description: This string stores the content of HTTP raw request. If the request cannot fit into String1 then it should be split and put in Strings 1 through 5.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP String 4
item_prototype.description: This string stores the content of HTTP raw request. If the request cannot fit into String1 then it should be split and put in Strings 1 through 5.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP String 5
item_prototype.description: This string stores the content of HTTP raw request. If the request cannot fit into String1 then it should be split and put in Strings 1 through 5.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP URL
item_prototype.description: A string which represents the URL to which a HTTP probe should communicate with.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP Version
item_prototype.description: A string which specifies the version number of the HTTP Server. The syntax for the version string is <major number>.<minor number> An example would be 1.0, 1.1 etc.,.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} HTTP VRF
item_prototype.description: This field is used to specify the VPN name in which the RTT operation will be used. For regular RTT operation this field should not be configured. The agent will use this field to identify the VPN routing Table for this operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest DNS RTT
item_prototype.description: Round Trip Time taken to perform DNS query within the HTTP operation. If an IP Address is specified in the URL, then DNSRTT is 0.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest HTTP Response
item_prototype.description: An sense description for the completion status of the latest RTT operation. (HTTP Codes?)

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest Message Body Size
item_prototype.description: The size of the message body received as a response to the HTTP request.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest Operation RTT
item_prototype.description: Round Trip Time taken to perform HTTP operation. This value is the sum of DNSRTT, TCPConnectRTT and TransactionRTT.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest RTT Operation Sense Status
item_prototype.description:
A sense code for the completion status of the latest RTT operation.
0 = other 1 = ok 4 = timeout 6 = notConnected 14 = dnsQueryerror

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest RTT Operation Timestamp
item_prototype.description: The value of the agent system time at the time of the latest RTT operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest TCP Connect RTT
item_prototype.description: Round Trip Time taken to connect to the HTTP server.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} Latest Transaction RTT
item_prototype.description: Round Trip Time taken to download the object specified by the URL.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Count
item_prototype.description: This is the total number of probe operations that have been attempted. This value is incremented for each start of an RTT operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Frequency
item_prototype.description: Specifies the duration between initiating each RTT operation.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Operation State
item_prototype.description:
The RttMonOperStatus object is used to manage the 'state' of the probe that is implementing conceptual RTT control row.
1 = Reset 2 = Orderly Stop 3 = Immediate Stop 4 = Pending 5 = Inactive 6 = Active 7 = Restart

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Threshold
item_prototype.description: This object defines an administrative threshold limit. If the RTT operation time exceeds this limit and if the conditions specified in rttMonReactAdminThresholdType or rttMonHistoryAdminFilter are satisfied, a threshold is generated.

item_prototype.name: IP SLA {#SNMPINDEX} RTT Timeout
item_prototype.description: Specifies the duration to wait for a RTT operation completion.

trigger_prototype.name: HTTP response code for {ITEM.VALUE2} returned with {ITEM.VALUE1}
HTTP SLA check for {ITEM.VALUE3} hasn't run for 10 polls
Last HTTP SLA check for {ITEM.VALUE3} failed
